itab
The function returns a value of the "Number" type based on the original input object value from the
table of coefficients
.
Syntax
itab
(tableIndex, [date], tableIndexDim)
Setting
Purpose
tableIndex
Selecting a
table of coefficients
created earlier in the registry of instances of the "Calculation Module. Table of coefficients (group)" / "Calculation Module. Table of coefficients (versions)".
date
Determining the date on which the value is taken from the table of coefficients.
Used when working with historical values.
Most often the date is specified with the "Date" type attribute, which should be set instead of the
currentDate
dummy variable.
This parameter is added when the "Specify date" checkbox is active.
tableIndexDim
The dimensions of the table of coefficients (rows and columns) are fixed automatically from the selected table of coefficients.
It is necessary to specify the value of each dimension, replacing the dummy variables
param_1, param_2
.
Most often the dimension is defined by an attribute via the
attr
function.
Specify date - the sign that determines the possibility to specify the date within the function. Used when working with tables of historical values.
If the attribute and date are selected, the System will make a calculation based on the table values for the specified date.
Note
The function is called using the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Sources" tab.
When calling the function, a window opens where it is necessary to select the previously created
table of coefficients
. If necessary, check the "Specify date" checkbox.
